Detailed Description

A view for selecting the time of day, in either 24 hour or AM/PM mode.

Common control of the TimePicker.

 class MyListener : public gaia::ui::IOnScrollIdleStateListener
 {
   public:
     MyListener();
     virtual ~MyListener();
     virtual void onDataSet(NumberPicker* target, int32_t data);
 };

 MyListener::MyListener()
 {
 }

 MyListener::~MyListener()
 {
 }

 void MyListener::onDataSet(NumberPicker* target, int32_t data)
 {
    //Callback to provide CenterView Id when scroll state turn to idle.
 }

 TimePicker* tp = new TimePicker(this);
 MyListener* ml = new MyListener();
 tp->dispatchIOnScrollIdleStateListener(ml);
 tp->setCurrentHour(10);
 tp->setCurrentMinute(10);
 tp->setCurrentSecond(10);
